Question: This person is producer of the Spike Jonze film Where The Wild Things Are, based on the children's book by Maurice Sendak.
Hints: In August 2005, this person was voted in as vice president of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.
This person lost thirty-five pounds and thinned his hair in order to appear sickly for the role.
This person acted in school plays, including South Pacific, while attending Skyline High School in Oakland, California.
